title: Week 4 Recap: Brady Wins in His Return to New England, Cardinals Move to 4-0, and Rookie Quarterbacks Impress
description:
Kevin and Nora are joined by Ben Solak to discuss Tom Brady’s victory in his return to Foxborough. Then they talk about some other major results in Week 4 such as the Cardinals beating the Rams, the Cowboys staying hot, and much more. Then Kevin and Nora are joined by Steven Ruiz to take a deep look into the Baltimore Ravens' road win over the Denver Broncos. Lastly Kevin and Nora wrap up by answering some listener questions.

Hosts: Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti
Guests: Benjamin Solak and Steven Ruiz
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
